message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of significant value to your business. While I won't disclose the exact nature of the product right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $1 million to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950,000. This is a price point that allows me to make a good profit while offering you a considerable discount on its true value.  Consider this a win-win situation. Please let me know your decision.
